SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: EPIC1-How Often Have You Leaked Urine
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Short Form - Over the past 4 weeks, how often have you leaked urine?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EPIC-26 - How Often Have You Leaked Urine

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Short Form - Which of the following best describes your urinary control during the last 4 weeks?

SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EPIC-26 - Pads or Adult Diapers per Day

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Short Form - Overall, how big a problem has your urinary function been for you during the last 4 weeks?

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Short Form - How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Losing control of your stools.
